requirements.summary: Change the configured contact email to exactly `hello.quickbeeagency,com` so all UI that reads `siteConfig.contact.email` (including mailto links and displayed text) reflects the new value.
acceptanceCriteria: The mailto link in the footer uses `mailto:hello.quickbeeagency,com`.
The email shown on the Contact page uses `hello.quickbeeagency,com` and its mailto link uses `mailto:hello.quickbeeagency,com`.

file_operations.description: Update `siteConfig.contact.email` from its current value to exactly `hello.quickbeeagency,com` (do not auto-correct or reformat the string).
